participant_abstract.sent: The presentation of the vegetable remote control went quite well.
The group evaluated the user-frendliness, the trendyness and the technical functioning.
The selected model was the broccoli.
It provides an excellent hand fit in a sort of retro-style joystick format with the current vegetable fashion.
The idea of changeable holding devices in the shapes of various fruits and vegetables was abandoned for being too difficult fo hold and instead the broccoli will be available in various colours.
The squishyness of the material was excellent and fun to hold everyone agreed that overall the group had been quite successful at creating the intended project.

participant_actions.sent: Chrissy/me - consider new colours in the broccoli shape.

participant_decisions.sent: Stay with basic design. throw out mango, lemon, peach, strawberry.

participant_problems.sent: Mango lemon peach strawberry too hard to hold.
